function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Underutilization of offices and commercial spaces during lockdown leading to ventilation issues and increased energy transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Renovation and refurbishment of existing buildings without considering circularity and sustainability
